subdisciplines.name: Environmental Justice
subdisciplines.description: The study of how environmental inequalities intersect with social inequalities such as race, class, and gender.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Health
subdisciplines.description: The study of how environmental factors affect human health and well-being, and how social factors shape exposure and vulnerability to environmental hazards.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Policy
subdisciplines.description: The study of how social and political institutions shape environmental policy, and how environmental policy affects society and the environment.
